text:
@GOPChairwoman @realDonaldTrump Congrats Jacksonville!  

Free Covid-19 for EVERY resident!

If I was a resident of Jacksonville (and not a ghost), I would immediately relocate.  14 days after the start of the convention....expect a spike from the virus.

Never did a city lose so much by winning.

#disaster
